remark.p: member, Office of Research and Analysis for American Republics, Bureau of Intelligence and Research, Department of State, from 1969 until 1970; member, Office of Bolivian and Chilean Affairs, Bureau of Inter-American Affairs, Department of State, from 1971

member, Office of Research and Analysis for American Republics, Bureau of Intelligence and Research, Department of State from 1969 until 1970; member, Office of Bolivian and Chilean Affairs, Bureau of Inter-American Affairs, Department of State from 1971
